Our goal is to ensure that every user can stay up-to-date with the promotional activities of their favorite apps, whether it's price reductions on the apps themselves or limited-time promotions for in-app purchases. entry.content:
Thank you for subscribing to our RSS feed. We are a community-driven project dedicated to bringing the latest App Store discount information to users worldwide. Our goal is to ensure that every user can stay up-to-date with the promotional activities of their favorite apps, whether it's price reductions on the apps themselves or limited-time promotions for in-app purchases. We will cover them all for you!

About our RSS feed

  • Focused on delivering App Store app discount information
  • Whenever an app's price drops or in-app purchases go on sale, we will promptly send you a notification
  • Each app's discount information is presented in a separate feed
  • The RSS feed is completely open-source, allowing you to view, contribute, and add your favorite apps at any time

entry.content:
Discount Information

In-App Purchases

  • Huge InvestmentÔºö‚Ç∫229,99

  • InvestmentÔºö‚Ç∫99,99
  • Large InvestmentÔºö‚Ç∫129,99
  • Premium livery bundleÔºö‚Ç∫249,99

Application Description

MOTORSPORT MANAGER 4: MASTER RACE STRATEGY BUILD YOUR RACING DYNASTY Immerse yourself in the captivating journey of constructing your motorsport empire from the ground up, where every choice holds the key to your success. ASSEMBLE YOUR DREAM TEAM Hand-pick exceptional drivers and engineer a world-class racing powerhouse. Collaborate closely with drivers to secure pole positions and craft pitstop strategies that lead to race domination. REAL-TIME STRATEGY UNFOLDS Experience the adrenaline-pumping action of races in real-time or navigate through intricate strategy screens. Swiftly adapt to ever-changing weather, unexpected crashes, and the emergence of safety cars. UNLEASH VARIETY ON THE TRACK Embark on thrilling GT and Endurance racing adventures across six distinct championships. Immerse yourself in the iconic beauty of Monaco's settings, rendered in breathtaking artistry. DRIVERS TAKE CENTER STAGE Step into the shoes of promising new drivers, delve into their statistics, and cultivate pivotal relationships. Navigate the revamped HQ, seize upgrade opportunities, and master the new part development system for an immersive journey. YOUR JOURNEY, YOUR CHALLENGE Embark on a motorsport odyssey where every choice shapes your destiny. Witness dynamic AI team movements and adjust the difficulty level as the game evolves with you. SEIZE CONTROL, MAKE HISTORY It's your opportunity to rewrite the annals of racing lore and etch your name into the history of motorsport. Motorsport Manager 4 empowers you like never before.

entry.content:
Discount Information

In-App Purchases

  • The Ultimate Life CollectionÔºö‚Ç∫899,99

  • Super Hero World BundleÔºö‚Ç∫249,99

Application Description

Live 1000 lives in the official sequel to the classic family board game, The Game of Life! Will you be a Video Blogger or an Astronomer? Play now! Voted "Best Digital Board Game‚Äù in the Pocket Gamer Awards 2021 Played by over 50 Million Families Worldwide Customise your peg, hop in your eco car and race your friends and family through The Game of Life 2! It‚Äôs a contemporary sequel to the classic family favourite board game, The Game of Life. With an added crossroad moment and new ways to win, what will you choose? Earn points for Knowledge and Happiness as well as Wealth. Go to College, or don‚Äôt. Get married early, save it for later, or stay single! Have kids, adopt pets, do both or neither. The choices are all yours, and every decision counts! Features The Game of Life 2 digital board game is the award-winning sequel to the original Hasbro board game, The Game of Life. ‚Ä¢ A GAME FOR UP 4 PLAYERS - Join 3 of your favourite people and live your dreams ‚Ä¢ *NEW* VIDEO CHAT AND PLAY - Live every life face-to-face with in-game video chat ‚Ä¢ AN AD-FREE GAME - Enjoy the complete game with no interruptions ‚Ä¢ 6 TRANSLATIONS - English, French, Spanish, German, Italian and Brazilian Portuguese ‚Ä¢ SINGLE PLAYER - Take on our challenging AI ‚Ä¢ ONLINE MULTIPLAYER - Connect with fans, or invite friends and family to a private game ‚Ä¢ PASS & PLAY - No internet? No problem! Pass a single device between players for a wifi-free experience How to play CUSTOMISE your character Customise your pink, blue or newly available purple peg with a style all of your own. SPIN THE SPINNER The game starts with a big decision. Will you go to College or straight into work? In this classic simulation, what will your friends and family choose? It‚Äôs your LIFE PATH Get married or don‚Äôt, have kids, adopt pets, or both! Work as a Pet Groomer, then qualify and become a Wind Turbine Technician! The choices are yours! More WAYS TO WIN Earn points for every choice you make! Every choice increases your wealth, happiness or knowledge, so every decision is valid. RETIRE your way Continue living the life of your dreams! Relax in a luxury home, or hit the road and fulfil your bucket list! Unlike the classic board game, you can choose to venture on! Earn REWARDS to UNLOCK new items Unlock new pegs, outfits and vehicles by playing the game and earning rewards! In-game Video Chat Recreate the magic! Gather around the board with in-game video chat in Online Multiplayer Mode. It‚Äôs super easy to set-up and play: ‚Ä¢ Create your free private account ‚Ä¢ Invite your friends and family to chat groups ‚Ä¢ Start games straight from those chats ‚Ä¢ Play face-to-face wherever you are It‚Äôs simple, seamless fun for everyone. The Ultimate Life Collection Venture into a collection of 10 amazing fantasy worlds. Live life in enchanted worlds, make friends with dinosaurs in the Age of Giants and launch into the futuristic Lunar Age! Every new world features new Outfits, Vehicles, Jobs, Properties and more!

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad

entry.content:
Discount Information

In-App Purchases

  • 8mm ProÔºö‚Ç∫1.799,99 ‚Üí ‚Ç∫119,99 [‚Ç∫119,99 ~ ‚Ç∫1.799,99]

All Price Information

PriceÔºö‚Ç∫179,99

In-App Purchases

  • 8mm ProÔºö‚Ç∫119,99
  • Silent Film ThemeÔºö‚Ç∫0,00
  • Light Leak ThemeÔºö‚Ç∫0,00
  • Countdown ThemeÔºö‚Ç∫0,00

Application Description

8mm is so realistic it was even used to film scenes in the Oscar-winning documentary Searching for Sugar Man! We have established the de facto standard of real-time retro film emulation. It was featured by Apple in App of the Day, App of the Week, In the Director's Chair, App Store Essentials, etc. 8mm Vintage Camera captures the beauty and magic of old-school vintage movies right through your viewfinder. Dust and scratches, retro colors, flickering, light leaks, and even frame shake, all can be instantly added with a single tap of the finger. SHOOT BOTH PHOTOS AND VIDEOS WITH SOPHISTICATED LIVE EFFECTS ‚Ä¢ Combine effects of film color, halation, dust & scratch, film grain, and softening to create authentic old-school movies ‚Ä¢ Adjust the strength of the effects to achieve your own unique visual style ‚Ä¢ 10 Lenses (frame) effects: Projector, Vignetting, Light Leak, Color Fringing, Super 8, Screen, 16mm, Tube, color negatives of Super 8 and 16mm ‚Ä¢ 21 Retro & Aged Films: 1920, Noir, 60s, 70s, Sakura, XPro, Siena, Pela, Indigo, Tuscan, Two-Color, 2-Strip, 3X, and monochromes ‚Ä¢ Additional 21 filters that emulate real historical films and expired films - available with the 8mm Pro subscription ‚Ä¢ Jitter Button to imitate real 8mm projectors frame shakes ‚Ä¢ Sound Switch to add projector sound for extra authenticity or mute the video for a silent movie effect. ‚Ä¢ Up to 4K 30fps with original unfiltered video recording on newer devices A COMPACT EDITOR FOR MOVIE CREATION - Apply film and frame effects to clips - Trim video, pan & zoom photo - Add a soundtrack from your music library - Choose from 5 unique themes with matching titles, transitions 8MM PRO SUBSCRIPTION - You can subscribe or make a one-time purchase for unlimited access to all current filters and future updates - Start your subscription with a free 7-day trial. Once the trial is over, you‚Äôll be charged an annual subscription fee - Your subscription will automatically renew unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the current period. You can go to your Settings > Apple ID > Subscriptions to turn auto-renew off

entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö‚Ç∫229,99 ‚Üí ‚Ç∫129,99 [‚Ç∫129,99 ~ ‚Ç∫229,99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºö‚Ç∫129,99

Application Description

Klei Entertainment has partnered with our friends at CAPY, creators of Superbrothers: Sword and Sworcery, Super Time Force and Below; to bring fans of Don‚Äôt Starve the latest single-player expansion: Don‚Äôt Starve: Shipwrecked! In Don't Starve: Shipwrecked, Wilson finds himself stranded in a tropical archipelago. He must learn to survive all over again in this new environment filled with new biomes, seasons, and creatures. Don‚Äôt let the tropical breeze lull you into a false sense of security - the world might be different, but it is still equal parts unforgiving and uncompromising. You will quickly find these islands are full to the brim with things that want to kill you. Key Features: Navigate the Open Ocean: Craft a boat and set sail for adventure! Explore an Entirely New World: The entire world is different. Explore new biomes filled with new resources. Scavenge for new sources of food. Run for your life from a host of new creatures. Brave New Seasons: A set of tropically inspired seasons will try their hardest to kill you. Craft New Recipes: Build an array of new gadgets to help yourself survive these harsh islands.

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad

entry.title: Little Big Workshop
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö‚Ç∫69,99 ‚Üí ‚Ç∫11,99 [‚Ç∫11,99 ~ ‚Ç∫69,99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºö‚Ç∫11,99

Application Description

Imagine a magical factory, appearing right in your living room. A carefully planned masterpiece, where diligent workers throw together anything customers want. Rubber ducks and dressers, drones and electric guitars, scooters and other wonderful goods can be created from many different materials and sold for hard cash ‚Äì cash you invest right back into your factory to get more machines, more workers and grow your business. In Little Big Workshop you become a factory tycoon! Real factories - made FUN You are the Big Boss and it‚Äôs time to take charge of your very own tabletop factory. Organize the factory floor, manage your workers, purchase machinery, and design efficient production lines - all within the time-limit and to your client's satisfaction! An open-ended sandbox-experience Take it easy, it‚Äôs a sandbox-experience where you think, ponder and poke at things until you get it to work the way you‚Äôd like. Supply products to clients and an ever-changing market, as you produce over 50 unique product types, built from multiple parts and pieces - all of which can be created with different materials and production methods. No two factories should ever look the same. Tiny hands, big dreams Start out with just a small workshop and expand to a desk-filling factory. Unlock ever fancier machines, add even more production methods, and most of all, more room. Soon enough you‚Äôll be running multiple production lines, producing hundreds of advanced products each day, and watching with joy as your cute workers do the actual work. Features: - Varying industries and a wide range of products - Focus on practical problems, not on values, economics, or logistics - Organize all steps of the production on a blueprint - Factories grow as you unlock more desk space - Fully simulated Day/Night-cycle - Take care of your workers! Work them too hard and they drop like flies - Cute model-town art-style

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad

Application Description

***NOTE: Don't Starve requires iOS 8 and at least an iPhone 5, iPad 3, or iPad mini 2. Due to memory constraints, it will not run on older devices.*** Don‚Äôt Starve: Pocket Edition, brings the hit PC game enjoyed by over 4 million players to the iPhone and iPad. Now you can experience the uncompromising wilderness survival game full of science and magic on the go! Play as Wilson, an intrepid Gentleman Scientist who has been trapped and transported to a mysterious wilderness world. Wilson must learn to exploit his environment and its inhabitants if he ever hopes to escape and find his way back home. Enter a strange and unexplored world full of strange creatures, dangers, and surprises. Gather resources to craft items and structures that match your survival style. Play your way as you unravel the mysteries of this strange land. ******************************************************** Awards: - Independent Games Festival: Grand Prize Nominee - Independent Games Festival: Excellence in Design Nominee - Independent Games Festival: Audience Award Nominee - Capsule Computers: Editor‚Äôs Choice - Indie Game Reviewer: Game of the Year Key Features: Optimized for Touch: New intuitive touch interface lets you explore, fight, craft and manage inventory with ease. Uncompromising Survival & World Exploration: No instructions. No help. No hand holding. Start with nothing and craft, hunt, research, farm and fight to survive. Dark and Whimsical Visuals: 2D characters and odd creatures inhabiting a unique 3D world. Randomly Generated New Worlds: Want a new map? No problem! At any time you can generate a new living and breathing world that hates you and wants you to die.

entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö‚Ç∫1.299,99 ‚Üí ‚Ç∫829,00 [‚Ç∫829,00 ~ ‚Ç∫1.299,99]Ôºâ

PriceÔºö‚Ç∫829,00

Application Description

Discover the legend within. Before you buy, please expand this description and check that your computer matches or exceeds each of the requirements listed. In the breathtaking sequel to Tomb Raider, Lara Croft becomes more than a survivor as she embarks upon her first great expedition to explore the earth‚Äôs most ancient and remote regions and uncover the secret of immortality. Harness Lara‚Äôs growing talents in a dramatic action-adventure ranging from Syria‚Äôs sun-baked ruins to Siberia‚Äôs frozen mountains. Play as the young archaeologist as she conquers tombs, outpaces rivals, and establishes her legend. THE COMPLETE ADVENTURE Rise of the Tomb Raider: 20 Year Celebration equips the base game with its entire collection of DLC. Uncover the secrets of Croft Manor in Blood Ties, find the truth behind a mythic terror in Baba Yaga: The Temple of the Witch, prevent a lethal outbreak in Cold Darkness, and face waves of supernatural enemies in Lara‚Äôs Nightmare. In Endurance Mode, survive the harsh Siberian wilderness alone or co-operatively with another player. Important information regarding Rise of the Tomb Raider: The game is officially supported on the following Macs. To check your Mac model and when it was released, select About This Mac from the Apple menu on your menu bar. ‚ó¶ All 13" MacBook Pros released since 2016 ‚ó¶ All 15" MacBook Pros released since Late 2013 with a 2.3GHz processor or better ‚ó¶ All 21.5" iMacs released since 2017 ‚ó¶ All 27" iMacs released since Late 2013 (models with an Nvidia GT 755M graphics card are not officially supported) (1) ‚ó¶ All Mac Pros released since Late 2013 (1) Late 2012 models with a 2GB Nvidia 680MX graphics card are also supported. The following Macs are capable of running the game but do not consistently meet the standards required for official support. ‚ó¶ All 15" MacBook Pros released since Late 2013 ‚ó¶ All 21.5" iMacs released since Late 2013 with a 2.3GHz processor or better (models with an Nvidia 750M graphics card are not supported). ‚Ä¢ Minimum System Requirements: ‚ó¶ Processor: 2.3GHz ‚ó¶ RAM: 8GB ‚ó¶ Graphics: 1.5GB ‚ó¶ macOS: 10.13.4 ‚ó¶ Free Space: 36GB Check the Feral website for more detailed specifications. ‚Ä¢ If you require assistance, please contact our support team at support@feralinteractive.com ‚Ä¢ Supports over 100 different models of gamepad. entry.content:
Discount Information

In-App Purchases

  • Orbit PackÔºö‚Ç∫229,99 ‚Üí ‚Ç∫99,99 [‚Ç∫99,99 ~ ‚Ç∫229,99]

All Price Information

PriceÔºö‚Ç∫249,99

In-App Purchases

  • Orbit PackÔºö‚Ç∫99,99

Application Description

Have you ever struggled to find confidence on stage or inspiration in the studio? AeroPads cues immersive pads and soundscapes that inspire and equip you to perform and write your best. ENHANCE YOUR SOUND. ENGAGE YOUR AUDIENCE. Every musician has experienced an empty mix or an awkward transition. When using AeroPads, you instantly add more dimension and character to your sound. With a more immersive mix and the ability to perform smooth and seamless transitions, you will feel more confident while your audience will be more engaged. FOR EVERY MUSICIAN. Pads and soundscapes are a versatile accompaniment to nearly any style of music. Whether you are a soloist or full band, AeroPads will take your sound to the next level. Rock bands, worship teams, wedding singers, producers, songwriters, and instrumentalists are just a few of the many types of musicians that have loved using AeroPads. DESIGNED FOR THE STAGE. INSPIRED BY SPACE. AeroPads features creative and immersive soundscapes paired with a beautiful and intuitive interface, all inspired by the pinnacle of exploration and inspiration: outer space. CREATIVITY THAT SPARKS CREATIVITY. AeroPads aren't your typical pads. Most pads out there are really boring or insanely obnoxious. However, AeroPads features thoughtfully crafted soundscapes that are meticulously fine-tuned with the perfect amount of harmonic and textural movement. Simply put, AeroPads won't step on the toes of your arrangement or get on the nerves of your sound guy (like most other pads out there). Highlighted Features: - A beautiful space-inspired interface with a simple and intuitive design. - Live View: Every key and three of your favorite patches are instantly accessible (best suited for experimentation, free-flowing sets, and songwriting). - Setlist View: Plan and build a detailed setlist (best suited for structured sets and seamless transitions). - The iconic Atmosphere Soundpack which includes five unique patches named after and inspired by the layers of Earth's atmosphere. - Three patches can be added to Live View to be made instantly accessible, so there's no need to dig through menus to just to change a patch when performing live. - Additional patches and Soundpacks available for purchase. - Key-specific pads in multiple tonalities: major, minor, and neutral. - Concert pitch adjustment. How to Use: 01. Cue a pad that matches the key of your musical arrangement. 02. Play overtop of the accompanying pads and soundcapes. 03. Enjoy the boost of audience engagement, musician confidence, and creative inspiration. Pads and soundscapes are intended as a subtle accompaniment to musical arrangements/performances. They are designed to be cued according to the key of the arrangement. Once cued, you'll hear a droning pad centered around the root note with additional harmonic textures within the selected key. The only time a pad's key should change within a song is in the instance of a key change. For best results, mix AeroPads appropriately within the overall mix. When mixed too loud, AeroPads may compete with melodies and the arrangement. When mixed too quietly, AeroPads may be less effective. When mixed appropriately, they will sound awesome.

Can you stop the Insurgency? From the creator of Plague Inc. comes a unique and deeply engaging political/military strategic simulation. The war is ‚Äòover‚Äô - but we all know that doesn‚Äôt mean anything. To stabilise the country, you need to balance military and civilian priorities to win the hearts and minds of the people, whilst also stopping insurgents from seizing power! Rebel Inc. is the brand new game from the creator of ‚ÄòPlague Inc.‚Äô - one of the most popular paid games ever with over 130 million players. Brilliantly executed with beautiful graphics and critically acclaimed gameplay - Rebel Inc. offers a deeply engaging, strategic challenge inspired by the complexities and consequences of modern counter insurgency. ‚óà‚óà‚óà #1 top paid game globally ‚óà‚óà‚óà ‚ñ∂ ‚ÄúRebel Inc. lets everyone wrestle with the messy challenges of post-conflict recovery and better understand the complex realities of building peace.‚Äù - World Bank Global Lead for Stability, Peace and Security ‚ñ∂ "Highly rewarding spiritual sequel to one of the App Store's biggest hits." - Pocket Tactics ‚ñ∂ "Surprisingly sophisticated... even better than some of the stabilization training software I have seen in government use" - PAXsims ‚ñ∂ "Rebel Inc. is fascinating and fun" - 148Apps.com ‚ñ∂ "Another great game and a worthy successor to Plague Inc" - App Store review ‚ñ∂ "If you love strategy games then this is the game for you" - App Store review ‚ñ∂ "Brilliant game, the gameplay is interesting and the strategy is intuitive!" - App Store review ‚ñ∂ "Unlike anything I‚Äôve played on here before" - App Store review ‚óà‚óà‚óà Features: ‚óè Stabilise 9 richly modeled regions ‚óè Innovative representation of counter insurgency tactics ‚óè Fund realistic initiatives to empower the local government ‚óè Highly detailed, hyper-realistic world based on extensive research ‚óè Intelligent strategic and tactical AI ‚óè Sophisticated narrative algorithms shaped by your decisions ‚óè 8 unique governors with radically different abilities ‚óè Conduct large-scale Operations in Campaign mode ‚óè Play new generated Challenges every week ‚óè 13 Official Scenarios including disease outbreaks, helicopters and advanced insurgents ‚óè Comprehensive in-game help and tutorial system ‚óè Full Save/Load functionality ‚óè Internet connectivity not required An important note: Although a fictional game, Rebel Inc. looks at important real world issues and we have made every effort to deal with them sensitively. The game has been extensively researched and has been developed in cooperation with leading regional politicians, business people and journalists as well as international charities, experts and governments. Rebel Inc. is now fully localised in English, French, German, Spanish, Portuguese, Italian, Korean, Japanese, Chinese (Simplified and Traditional), and Russian. Application Description

Survive in post-nuclear USSR: defeat diseases, hunger and enemies! Play Online also! Survive with other players together. Benefits of Premium version: - Unique pet Raven - Starter Kit - Caches of useful items in shelters - Expanded selection of perks - Chat without any limitations - Reduced waiting time between parcels - Access to all kinds and colors of map markers Can you survive in the world destroyed after a nuclear war? With radiation, hunger and diseases around you. You have to cross the whole country and save your family. Who knows if they are alive, or maybe radiation and deadly virus have already reached them? Reveal a secret of the apocalypse and get your memories back during a journey across the huge territory of the USSR in the 80th. It is not easy to survive after apocalypse. You'll face the real hungry games! Monsters, zombie, thirst, uncountable diseases and injuries, blood-thirsty enemies ‚Äì you have to fight it all. Craft all your resources: weapons, clothes, means of transport. - Hardcore survival: Hunger, zombie and radiation won't give you a chance to relax. - Realistic world: The turn of the seasons, huge map of USSR and more than 2500 different towns and cities. Hunt animals, but be careful: even rats can injure you seriously! Explore the wilderness! - A lot of opportunities: Multicraft, obtaining skills, hundreds of crafting schemes, a lot of ammunition. - People and stories: Interesting quests and helpful allies. An open game world. - Improve your skills: Mechanics, medicine, chemistry and many others. - Cooperative mode: The Online mode with a chat room, exchange of items and united fightings. Multiplayer survival game. Explore the abandoned houses and shelters. Find weapon and build transport using various materials. Remember everything you learnt on chemistry and physics! It is the most realistic surviving game! Features: - –°raft system ‚Äì get resources, hunt, find useful objects or weapon and create your own one! - Hardcore simulator of survival - Journey across the wilderness map in the multiplayer mode - Choose the difficulty mode: sandbox, real life or online War never changes. In 1985 USSR went down before an unknown enemy. In a few days the entire country became a radioactive wasteland - violence, hunger and diseases reign here now. Application Description

Live 1000 lives in the official sequel to the classic family board game, The Game of Life! Will you be a Video Blogger or an Astronomer? Play now! Voted "Best Digital Board Game‚Äù in the Pocket Gamer Awards 2021 Played by over 50 Million Families Worldwide Customise your peg, hop in your eco car and race your friends and family through The Game of Life 2! It‚Äôs a contemporary sequel to the classic family favourite board game, The Game of Life. With an added crossroad moment and new ways to win, what will you choose? Earn points for Knowledge and Happiness as well as Wealth. Go to College, or don‚Äôt. Get married early, save it for later, or stay single! Have kids, adopt pets, do both or neither. The choices are all yours, and every decision counts! Features The Game of Life 2 digital board game is the award-winning sequel to the original Hasbro board game, The Game of Life. ‚Ä¢ A GAME FOR UP 4 PLAYERS - Join 3 of your favourite people and live your dreams ‚Ä¢ *NEW* VIDEO CHAT AND PLAY - Live every life face-to-face with in-game video chat ‚Ä¢ AN AD-FREE GAME - Enjoy the complete game with no interruptions ‚Ä¢ 6 TRANSLATIONS - English, French, Spanish, German, Italian and Brazilian Portuguese ‚Ä¢ SINGLE PLAYER - Take on our challenging AI ‚Ä¢ ONLINE MULTIPLAYER - Connect with fans, or invite friends and family to a private game ‚Ä¢ PASS & PLAY - No internet? No problem! Pass a single device between players for a wifi-free experience How to play CUSTOMISE your character Customise your pink, blue or newly available purple peg with a style all of your own. SPIN THE SPINNER The game starts with a big decision. Will you go to College or straight into work? In this classic simulation, what will your friends and family choose? It‚Äôs your LIFE PATH Get married or don‚Äôt, have kids, adopt pets, or both! Work as a Pet Groomer, then qualify and become a Wind Turbine Technician! The choices are yours! More WAYS TO WIN Earn points for every choice you make! Every choice increases your wealth, happiness or knowledge, so every decision is valid. RETIRE your way Continue living the life of your dreams! Relax in a luxury home, or hit the road and fulfil your bucket list! Unlike the classic board game, you can choose to venture on! Earn REWARDS to UNLOCK new items Unlock new pegs, outfits and vehicles by playing the game and earning rewards! In-game Video Chat Recreate the magic! Gather around the board with in-game video chat in Online Multiplayer Mode. It‚Äôs super easy to set-up and play: ‚Ä¢ Create your free private account ‚Ä¢ Invite your friends and family to chat groups ‚Ä¢ Start games straight from those chats ‚Ä¢ Play face-to-face wherever you are It‚Äôs simple, seamless fun for everyone. The Ultimate Life Collection Venture into a collection of 10 amazing fantasy worlds. Live life in enchanted worlds, make friends with dinosaurs in the Age of Giants and launch into the futuristic Lunar Age! Every new world features new Outfits, Vehicles, Jobs, Properties and more!

Application Description

SEIZE FORBIDDEN TREASURES. SUMMON ALIEN GODS. FEED ON YOUR DISCIPLES. BE WARNED. This game has no tutorial - part of the challenge is figuring out how to play. It's hard, but keep trying, and you'll master it. Good luck! In this infamous roguelike narrative card game, play as a seeker after unholy mysteries in a 1920s-themed setting of hidden gods and secret histories. Become a scholar of the unseen arts. Craft tools and summon spirits. Indoctrinate innocents. Seize your place as the herald of a new age. Cultist Simulator was first released on PC and has more than 200,000 players all over the world. Now we‚Äôre bringing the cosmic mysteries of Cultist Simulator to mobile. ‚Ä¢ Challenging roguelike gameplay - There is never only one history. Cultist Simulator doesn‚Äôt hold your hand. Experiment, expire and transcend death with a story-driven legacy system. Over time you‚Äôll learn enough to wrestle the game to its knees. ‚Ä¢ Intense, immersive narrative ‚Äì Combine cards to tell your own story. A hefty novel‚Äôs worth of choice-based storytelling, from the creator of Fallen London and Sunless Sea. There are many paths through this game of ambition, appetite and abomination, and many ways your tale can end. ‚Ä¢ A rich Lovecraftian world ‚Äì Corrupt your friends and consume your enemies. Search your dreams for sanity-twisting rituals. Translate grimoires and glean their lore. Penetrate the realm of the Hours and win a place in their service. Cultist Simulator brings the peripheral horror of Lovecraft‚Äôs tales to an entirely new setting. Expand your knowledge with the DLCs: New Legacies, New Ascensions, New Mechanics... ‚Ä¢ The Dancer - Join the Bacchanal ‚Ä¢ The Priest - Knock, and Ye Shall Be Opened ‚Ä¢ The Ghoul - Taste of the graveyard's fruit ‚Ä¢ The Exile - Some there are who will not yield If you encounter any issue with the game, please click on ‚ÄúContact us‚Äù at the bottom of this page and give us as many details as possible regarding the issue and your device: https://playdigious.helpshift.com/hc/en/11-cultist-simulator/?p=ios

Reveal a secret of the apocalypse and get your memories back during a journey across the huge territory of the USSR in the 80th. It is not easy to survive after apocalypse. You'll face the real hungry games! Monsters, zombie, thirst, uncountable diseases and injuries, blood-thirsty enemies ‚Äì you have to fight it all.
